analysis.description:

	External calls:
	- require(bool)(getTokensCount(clientAddress) >= tokensCount) (/unique_chucks/22/0x71b7e3a3ff05224c1e38031b3d887657db565a20.sol#228-229)
	State variables written after the call(s):

	- require(bool)(hasTokens(msg.sender)) (/unique_chucks/22/0x71b7e3a3ff05224c1e38031b3d887657db565a20.sol#209)
	State variables written after the call(s):

Insurance.transferTokensTo (/unique_chucks/22/0x71b7e3a3ff05224c1e38031b3d887657db565a20.sol#307-314) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-tokensContract.approve(address(this),tokensAmount) (/unique_chucks/22/0x71b7e3a3ff05224c1e38031b3d887657db565a20.sol#311-313)
	-tokensContract.transferFrom(address(this),to,tokensAmount) (/unique_chucks/22/0x71b7e3a3ff05224c1e38031b3d887657db565a20.sol)

Deprecated standard detected @ /unique_chucks/22/0x71b7e3a3ff05224c1e38031b3d887657db565a20.sol#184:
	- Usage of "throw" should be replaced with "revert()"

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/22/0x71b7e3a3ff05224c1e38031b3d887657db565a20.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.0 (/unique_chucks/22/0x71b7e3a3ff05224c1e38031b3d887657db565a20.sol#1): it allows old versions
